<template>
  <Form @submit="onSubmit" :validation-schema="taskSchema">
    <!-- Nombre -->
    <b-form-group label="Nombre:" label-for="name-input">
      <b-form-input
        id="name-input"
        v-model="formData.name"
        required
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Descripción -->
    <b-form-group label="Descripción:" label-for="description-textarea">
      <b-form-textarea
        id="description-textarea"
        v-model="formData.description"
        rows="3"
      ></b-form-textarea>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Estado -->
    <b-form-group label="Estado:" label-for="status-select">
      <b-form-select
        id="status-select"
        v-model="formData.status"
        :options="['low', 'medium', 'high']"
        required
      ></b-form-select>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Completado -->
    <b-form-group label="¿Completada?" label-cols-sm="4" label-align-sm="right">
      <b-form-checkbox
        v-model="formData.completed"
        switch
        size="lg"
      ></b-form-checkbox>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Fecha de expiración -->
    <b-form-group label="Fecha de Expiración:" label-for="expires-at-input">
      <b-form-input
        id="expires-at-input"
        type="datetime-local"
        v-model="formData.expires_at"
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>
  </Form>
</template>

<script>
import { TaskRepositoryImpl } from "@/app/task/infrastructure/repositories/TaskRepositoryImpl";
import { StoreTaskUseCase, UpdateTaskUseCase } from "@/app/task/usecases";
import * as yup from "yup";
import { Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "vee-validate";

export default {
  name: "TaskForm",

  props: {
    initialData: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({
        name: "",
        description: null,
        status: "low",
        completed: false,
        expires_at: null,
        id: null,
      }),
    },
  },

  data() {
    return {
      formData: { ...this.initialData },
      loading: false,
      error: null,
      taskSchema: yup.object().shape({
        name: yup.string().required("El nombre es obligatorio"),
        description: yup.string().nullable(),
        status: yup.string().oneOf(["low", "medium", "high"]).default("low"),
        completed: yup.boolean().default(false),
        expires_at: yup.date().nullable(),
      }),
    };
  },

  watch: {
    initialData: {
      deep: true,
      handler(newVal) {
        this.formData = { ...newVal };
      },
    },
  },

  methods: {
    async onSubmit(values) {
      try {
        const taskData = new Category({
          id: this.formData.id,
          description: values.description,
          active: values.active,
        });

        // Attempts to coerce values to the correct type
        let parsedData = taskSchema.cast(taskData, {
          stripUnknown: true,
          assert: true,
        });
        const taskRepository = new TaskRepositoryImpl();
        let response;

        if (this.formData.id) {
          // Actualizar tarea existente
          const updateTaskUseCase = new UpdateTaskUseCase(taskRepository);
          response = await updateTaskUseCase.execute(validData);
          this.$emit("task-updated", response);
        } else {
          // Crear nueva tarea
          const storeTaskUseCase = new StoreTaskUseCase(taskRepository);
          response = await storeTaskUseCase.execute(validData);
          this.$emit("task-added", response);
        }

        if (!response?.error) {
          this.formData = {
            name: "",
            description: null,
            status: "low",
            completed: false,
            expires_at: null,
            id: null,
          };
        }
      } catch (err) {
        console.error("Error al validar/guardar la tarea:", err);
        this.error = err.errors ? err.errors.join(", ") : "Hubo un error.";
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
